about_the_game:
Welcome to DiegoTC Toolbox!

This is a Platformer-Puzzle game with tons of level and puzzle variety, and lots of new mechanics to explore!


You play as Diego The Cube, a young and slick alien Cube who has been locked up in his foe's factory, putting you to the test against their security defenses.
Jumping and throwing boxes at things is the goal, but don't get lost in a maze of lasers and buttons.


Carry and push boxes to find your way through the end through beginner-friendly puzzles.
You have a variety of moves to your name to help you throughout your adventure in different locations.


Paint yourself vibrant colors to bypass security measures, take them for a fool!
And most importantly... Dont give up!

This demo includes 15 levels and 4 different wacky mechanics to play with.
